title: Scripted Light - 25 Min Uplifting Focus Music | Pravos Deep Work Sessions
description:
Experience Scripted Light - a 25-minute uplifting journey designed for energized focus and creative flow.

Pravos (www.pravos.xyz) is the focus workspace I built for myself. Simple. Beautiful. One interface for music, timer, and tasks. No more tab-juggling before the real work begins.

This album brings brightness and energy to your focus session. It follows the same arc as all Pravos music - grounding, rising, peak, gentle return - but with more lift and light.

Try Pravos: www.pravos.xyz
